description: Morisawa Yuu is a lively girl. One day, she catches sight of a mysterious light and chases after it. She discovers it`s a giant ship, and a pair of cats invite her aboard. There, a fairy named Pinopino explains that he`s gotten lost in a dream storm on his way home. With Yuu`s help, Pinopino finds his way. So, in thanks, he grants her a year of special powers!
